setenv

Set the value of an environment variable.

Syntax

getenv(env_name, env_value)

Input argument

env_name

a string: environment variable name.

env_value

a string: environment variable value.

Description

setenv set the value of an environment variable.

Example

setenv('MY_ENV_VAR', 'funvalue')
getenv('MY_ENV_VAR')
setenv('MY_ENV_VAR', '')
getenv('MY_ENV_VAR')

See also

getenv, searchenv.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
